title: Jovette’s Chili Con Carne
directions: Brown ground beef, drain fat and set aside.
Heat oil, garlic, let sizzle a little add onions and cook for 3 minutes.
Add browned beef (René adds mushrooms here)
Add rest of ingredients and stir well.
Cover and simmer about 45 minutes, stirring occasionally
Can also be served on white rice and with sour cream.
